data.description:
In a universe full of extraordinary characters and mysteries to discover, play as an apprentice tattoo artist disguised as the legendary Master. What can possibly go wrong?

Well… Not to mention that you will be surrounded by some exceptional and self-absorbed clients like vampires, internet celebrities, and possessed Viking warriors that each need a unique tattoo only a Master can handle!

During your sessions, you are armed with nothing but a mysterious mask, your tools and your inspiration. Use and unlock different equipment like tattoo machines, needles and various colors to experience being a tattoo artist in this wacky Tattooverse.

Unleash your imagination, give your clients the "ink" they want, and  prepare yourself for one of a kind adventure in Tattooverse!

changelog.change_log:
-New Intro Scene
-New Tutorial Scene
-Character Improvements
-New UI
-New Accessibility Options
-New Voice Acting
-New Musics
-New Tool : Racky (A tool to help you store and change your equipment in a more ergonomic way)
-New Bucketboi Features
-Improved Interaction Feedback
-Optimization Improvements
-Graphic Improvements
-Various Bug Fixes

Locomotion Updates
-Both controllers can be used to move and rotate now.
-Using rotation and movement at the same time is disabled while using one analogue stick.
-You can use one analogue stick of your choice to rotate and the second one to move in 4 directions.
-Smooth turn function is now frame rate independent and stabilized for Oculus Quest 1 & 2.
-Restricted areas (places you can’t teleport) are more distinctive now.

Accessibility Updates
-Now you can choose between 4 presets to change how you grab & hold your tattoo machine!
-You can reset your settings using the newly added Defaults button.
-Now you can access the tutorial on the pause menu.
-Tutorial cards simply appear with a better angle to players’ sight.

Tattooing Updates
-Now you can save your art and load it later to work on.
-Overlay tool is easier to see on customers’ skin.
-Rotation during choosing an overlay is disabled.
-Ink particle is added to tattoo machines

Customer Updates (Becky):
-Becky’s facial animations and eye movements are improved.
-Background music is enabled when players welcome Becky.
We've changed the location of some buttons for ergonomics
there was a UV problem on Becky, we fixed that, now the skin is in better shape for tattooing
We fixed all the issues and changed the environment. Also added a new left hand model for improving the tattoo experience.
